an6.108:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.108:1.7: Kayaduccaritassa pahanaya kayasucaritam bhavetabbam, vaciduccaritassa pahanaya vacisucaritam bhavetabbam, manoduccaritassa pahanaya manosucaritam bhavetabbam.
an6.108:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
